    • Method Detail

      • isDebugging

        public static boolean isDebugging(Plugin plugin)

      • setDebugging

        public static void setDebugging(Plugin plugin,
                boolean value)
        Enable debugging for all loggers. This basically sets all parentHandlers to a lower log level to ensure that messages are correctly logged. All newly created and existing loggers will also have debugging enabled.

        Log a configuration message with this logger.

      • isDebugging

        public boolean isDebugging()
        Check to see if the logger is logging debug messages.
        Returns:
        isDebugging true if it is logging debug messages, false otherwise.

      • setDebugging

        public void setDebugging(Boolean value)
        Set if a logger should be logging debug messages or not.
        Parameters:
        setDebugging - true if it is should log messages, false otherwise.

      • setPrefix

        public void setPrefix(String prefix)
        Set the prefix that goes in front of all the messages for all loggers.
        Parameters:
        prefix - The prefix to use for all loggers.
